Body:
in_shape = 2, 3, 4
n_hid = 5
in_to_hid = Mock(Layer, output_shape=(in_shape[0] * in_shape[1], n_hid),
    input_shape=(in_shape[0] * in_shape[1], in_shape[2]), input_layer=
    InputLayer((in_shape[0] * in_shape[1], in_shape[2])), get_output_kwargs
    =['foo'])
in_to_hid.get_output_for.return_value = T.matrix()
in_to_hid.get_params.return_value = []
hid_to_hid = Mock(Layer, output_shape=(in_shape[0], n_hid), input_shape=(
    in_shape[0], n_hid), input_layer=InputLayer((in_shape[0], n_hid)),
    get_output_kwargs=[])
hid_to_hid.get_output_for.return_value = T.matrix()
hid_to_hid.get_params.return_value = []
l_rec = lasagne.layers.CustomRecurrentLayer(InputLayer(in_shape), in_to_hid,
    hid_to_hid)
helper.get_output(l_rec, foo='bar')
args, kwargs = in_to_hid.get_output_for.call_args
assert len(args) == 1
assert kwargs == {'foo': 'bar'}
args, kwargs = hid_to_hid.get_output_for.call_args
assert len(args) == 1
assert kwargs == {'foo': 'bar'}
